TableSpec.Name: RGL Business Process Parameters
TableSpec.Description: Holds parameter for RGL populate business process
TableSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

TextField.Name: NAME
TextField.Description: The name of the parameter set

Trigger.Name: TR_USR_RGLPOPULATE_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL: create trigger TR_USR_RGLPOPULATE_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_RGLPOPULATE_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '9c549afc-c37c-4eb9-8e98-23d4d4e6ada4'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see RGLBusinessProcess.BusinessProcess.xml end
